About.paragraph: M-Foodz deals in all kinds of restaurants in all seven districts of Karachi, as it believes in delivering quality at your doorstep. Our quality assurance procedures are the best and the most innovative, up to the globalized food industry standards.The best has just got better with M-Foodz!
Why2: M-Foodz Is Just A Tap Away!

Services.name: Online Order
Services.text: A customer finds your restaurant on the M-Rides app and places an order.

Services.name: Restaurants Onboard
Services.text: The order is accepted and prepared by your restaurant.

Services.name: Food Delivery
Services.text: Our rider picks up the order from your restaurant and delivers it to the customer.

Contact.address: Mezzanine floor, Block Number 4, Clifton, Karachi.
Contact.AboutMFood: M-Foodz deals in all kinds of restaurants in all seven districts of Karachi, as it believes in delivering quality at your doorstep. Our quality assurance procedures are the best and the most innovative.

Features.title: Drive With M-Foods
Features.text: Earn extra money in your spare time. Set your availability, keep 100% of your delivery fees and tips, and get paid weekly.

Features.title: Partner With M-Foods
Features.text: Team up with us to reach more customers. Let us take care of the details, so you can stay focused on making great food.

Features.title: Careers At M-Foods
Features.text: Gain experience that matters. Grow with our team of high performers in a fun, challenging, and fast-paced environment.

Features.title: Grow with M-Foods
